metadata.title: CVE-2024-42934 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: OpenIPMI before 2.0.36 has an out-of-bounds array access (forauthentication type) in the ipmi_sim simulator, resulting in denial ofservice or (with very low probability) authentication bypass or codeexecution.

criterions.comment: openipmi package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
